ModifierType: Whether this module modifies the Source or the Target.
PositionOptions: The options associated with the position.
Position: The value to use when modifying the position.
TangentOptions: The options associated with the Tangent.
Tangent: The value to use when modifying the Tangent.
StrengthOptions: The options associated with the Strength.
Strength: The value to use when modifying the Strength.
bAbsoluteTangent: If true, don't transform the tangent modifier into the tangent basis.
